thread.title: Paytm’s The Great Apple sale: iPhone 7, MacBook pro, iPads, Apple Watch available on cashback offers | tech$news | Hindustan Times
thread.title_full: Paytm’s The Great Apple sale: iPhone 7, MacBook pro, iPads, Apple Watch available on cashback offers | tech$news | Hindustan Times

title: Paytm’s The Great Apple sale: iPhone 7, MacBook pro, iPads, Apple Watch available on cashback offers | tech$news | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Paytm’s The Great Apple sale: iPhone 7, MacBook pro, iPads, Apple Watch available on cashback offers 
Digital wallet service provider Paytm is now offering huge cashbacks on Apple products under its new sale campaign called “The Great Apple Sale”. tech Updated: Feb 14, 2017 19:32 IST HT Correspondent Hindustan Times 
If you have waiting for a cashback offer on the latest iPhones or the MacBook Pro, then Paytm brings in good news as it is offering cashbacks up to Rs 20,000 under a new sale campaign from 14th February to 16th February. 
Vijay Shekhar Sharma-promoted digital wallet service provider Paytm is holding a new sale campaign called “The Great Apple Sale”. Under the new sale campaign, Paytm is offering a flat Rs 12,000 cashback on the purchase of iPhone 7 256GB, which is listed at Rs 92,000. This means that a consumer can get it for Rs 80,000. 
Read: Apple iPhone 5S 16 GB Valentine’s Day offer gives cashbacks up to Rs 6,000 
As per terms and conditions of the sale, the cashback amount is credit to a user’s Paytm account with 24 hours of the product being shipped. What is interesting is that there is no option for cash on delivery for the cashback offer. 
Similarly, a consumer can get a cashback of Rs 7,500 on the iPhone 7 128GB variant that is listed for Rs 65,000. Thus means that a consumer can get the phone for Rs 57,500. 
Read: Nokia 6 offered on eBay India but here’s why you shouldn’t buy it just yet 
Paytm is also offering cashback of up to R. 20,000 on select MacBook models. The Apple MacBook Pro 15-inch (Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD) is available at Rs 1,50,000 and consumers will get a cashback of up to Rs 20,000. 
Other Apple products with cashback offers include the iPhone 6S 32GB listed for Rs 46,000 along with a cashback offer of Rs 6,000. This means that a consumer can get the product for Rs 40,000. 
There are also offers on iPads. The Apple iPad Pro 12.9 (32GB), listed at Rs 65,000, also has a cashback offer of Rs 9,000. Consumers can also avail a cashback of up to Rs 4,500 on the purchase of Apple Watch. 
It is important to note that cashbacks will be in form of Paytm money and not actual money. tags
